page.title: 17Watford: A Small Census 1
page.content: We interviewed people living in two roads on our square of the map. We interviewed 44 people. We asked the following questions: 1.How long have you lived in Watford? 2.Where did you live before that? FINDINGS: a.The longest time was 84 years. b.The shortest time was 2 months. c.The average time was 25.73 years. d.The total years of residence when added together was 1,132.5 . e.Some of our sample had always lived in Watford, others came from America Canada Other parts of England Eire India The Middle East Pakistan The West Indies.
